message:
are google ads something that I should fear ??!!
I recently got to know Neo4j  graph database .. and suddenly I can see many ads about it in many websites that I visit !!!!
do you see these ads yourselves?!! or does it really  relate with my browsing experience ???

data.message:
Yes Google is doing that all the time :)
They see what you've searched about and they deliver ads that matches your interests.. And in all cases I stopped trusting Google for a while now
wow .. so this is true .. next step is to find something to hold google from grabbing my interests like this .. suddenly I feel insecure as you said :)
It's AdWords cookies in your browser
And if you are really paranoid use Tor

Actually Microsoft did a huge ads campaign to raise awareness for users and to get some benefits itself it's called the Scroogled ads
Check this one:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iI1ominSL_c
Muhammad Saleh انت وجودك كان غلط في مودرن والله :D انا معرفكش بس عارف مودرن :D ريسبكت جدا صدقني فرحتني  :D
Rabna y5aleek ya basha :D - bs modern (handasa) kan feha nas kwayesa bgad bs elly ydawar yla2y :D
harod inbox e7traman l sa7b el post :D

You can try duckduckgo.com, I think that was the name, it respects your privacy.
Also, use Firefox as your default browser.
And don't use android.
I have encountered the same thing when I started learning Ruby on Rails, tons of ads either offering jobs as a developer or offering education resources. So yeah, google is more snoopy than a paranoid girlfriend.
الصراحة انا اتخضيت من كتر الإعلانات :D

That's how you pay for the great search service. Nothing is really free you know. That's also how you get personalised search results, and again, that's how Google makes money from search. They allow you to disable personalised ads and personalised search results, but this doesn't necessarily mean they don't collect the data (for tends. etc). Of you are conserved, use DuckDuckGo instead.

frankly I didn't know that they are taking that much of data .. i think its a problem if google knew what is my topics and search affinity .. at least they should reveal their compiled data about me and my behaviour and/or give me the chance to delete my footage from their servers. [[ who knows what are they keeping and what not ]] .. now I am thinking of hacking their coockies to send false information about me .. so that I F* their analysis algorithms :(
